name: Be Human .IO
tagline: A differing ideology to how we use technology.
body:
###Welcome to Be Human .IO, LLC
BeHuman.IO is a series of projects, experiments and exportations into the unknown; all revolving around the leverage of technology and sociology. The common goal for each of our DBAâ€™s (Doing Business As) is to impact society in a new, seldom seen way. Be them open source, free or paid.

The name Be Human stems from the desire to inject humanity back into the technology that has divided ourselves. When our digital selfs are a division our in-person self, we see an opportunity to change this. Where others may see this as the norm or an evolution of society, we do not.

### Current Projects
* Be More .Clothing
Philadelphia's first independent fashionable wearables boutique.
![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/261800/bmcLogo.png)
